overview:
Brian Patrick Mitchell is the Founder & CEO of GM Ryan International, the leading executive and professional level search firm in digital media and internet technology industries. Brian leads a team of industry veterans providing professional recruitment and investment solutions to companies, professionals, and venture capitalists from coast to coast. Brian has personally led over 100 successful executive searches across the CXO/SVP/VP spectrum within digital media/technology.

www.gmryan.com mitch@gmryan.com 301.263.9505
